snippet: Yemen’s president approved turning the country into a federal state, giving the south more autonomy. But some southerners are insisting on a separate state.
abstract: Yemeni Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi formally approves turning the country into a federal state, giving the south more autonomy; move is immediately rejected by some southerners who insist on a separate state.
lead_paragraph: Yemen’s president approved turning the country into a federal state, giving the south more autonomy. But some southerners are insisting on a separate state.

headline.main: Yemen: Federation Plan Offers South More Autonomy
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Federation Plan Offers South More Autonomy
